segments.text: I see the stool the boy is standing on, and it looks very unstable.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I feel a bit scared watching him balance like that.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The stool's legs are splayed out, ready to tip over.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think he's being quite brave, but it's dangerous.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl next to him seems to trust he won't fall.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if they've done this before.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I feel like I should tell him to be more careful.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman drying the dishes hasn't noticed the stool yet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope he doesn't fall and hurt himself.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can't believe how focused he is on that cookie jar.
segments.speaker: PAR
